product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: THE ORDINARY Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% 30ml, 1.01 Fl Oz, Liquid (Pack of 1)
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
Be aware of your skin type
body: I was super excited to try this product, but it actually caused me to brake out more. However that is just because of my skin type. I do have normal to oily sensitive skin so if you do I would not recommend but I have heard good reviews from others so it really depends on your skin. Packaging is really nice and cute:)

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: THE ORDINARY Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% 30ml, 1.01 Fl Oz, Liquid (Pack of 1)
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
Product irritated my skin
body: This product was recommended to me by a nurse to hopefully heal the skin irritation on my face. Instead, it burned when I applied it and caused my skin to peel.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: THE ORDINARY Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% 30ml, 1.01 Fl Oz, Liquid (Pack of 1)
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
The product is fine, the price is wrong
body: Okay, this is completely on me. I purchased this product after reading some amazing reviews only, and yes, it is very nice but what I didn't notice is that you can get it at Ulta for half the price. So I think this works best for somebody outside the US or with no access to a physical store.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: THE ORDINARY Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% 30ml, 1.01 Fl Oz, Liquid (Pack of 1)
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
PRICE
body: The product its self is fabulous got rid of my mild acne but the price aint it.  You can go to ULTA beauty store and get it for half the price.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: THE ORDINARY Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% 30ml, 1.01 Fl Oz, Liquid (Pack of 1)
title:
